name: mud-slap
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user hurls mud in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
flavor_text.platinum: The user hurls mud in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user hurls mud in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
